source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_00<tab>Loudjox has run out of wares to sell.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのラウドジョクスは、商品を切らしてしまったようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_01<tab>While Loudjox mistakes you for a customer, she realizes that she can part with some gil in exchange for the leaves of narbroois. Make your way to the Makers' Quarter, and slay the sweetly smelling monsters for six of their fragrant fronds.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_01<tab>ラウドジョクスと話した。彼は、商品の補充のため、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>を求めているようだ。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン工匠街で、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E0D01 /var>」を討伐して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>」を6枚入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_02<tab>You strike down a number of narbroois, and tear the leaves from their still bodies. Find your way back to Loudjox with the aromatic prizes.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>を入手した。イディルシャイアの「ラウドジョクス」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_03<tab>Loudjox delivers your payment for the leaves, explaining that they are part of a mixture that goblins place in their masks to avoid bad smells. Given your own experiences with goblin aromas, you decline her offer to take a sniff, and instead take your reward for helping the realm smell just a little better.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_SEQ_03<tab>ラウドジョクスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>を渡した。ゴブリン族のマスクの中には、香草が詰まっている。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>があれば、ラウドジョクス特製の香草ブレンドが作成できるらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_TODO_00<tab>Collect leaves from narbroois in the Makers' Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_TODO_00<tab>シャーレアン工匠街の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E0D01 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the narbrooi leaves to Loudjox.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_TODO_01<tab>イディルシャイアのラウドジョクスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B1D01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_000<tab>Pssshkoh... Loudjox has <var 1A 02 /var>told<var 1A 01 /var> you, Loudjox has no more smelling herbs for tod─ Hm? Uplander? You have not come with custom?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_000シュコォ……シュコォ……
香草ブレンド　売り切れ中　またの機会に　お願いね～！
……あれあれ　あんたは客じゃない？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_001<tab>Uplander <var 1A 02 /var>wants<var 1A 01 /var> custom? Hmmm... Loudjox <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> need six narbrooi leaves for bundle-making of fragrant herbs. From every corpse, uplander can take two leaves─and Loudjox will pay good jinglyshine so we are both happy!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_001仕事　探してるなら　任せたい～！
「」倒して　若葉を6枚　採ってきて～！
若葉は一度に　2枚採れる　それで幸せ　あんたも幸せ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_010<tab>Uplander does not know where narbrooi nest? Go to Makers' Quarter─many are floating around there. But make sure monsters are dead first─they are squealing muchly otherwise...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_010仕事　探してるなら　任せたい～！
「」倒して　若葉を6枚　採ってきて～！
若葉は一度に　2枚採れる　それで幸せ　あんたも幸せ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_020<tab>Narbrooi make nasty screechings, but their leaves have scent like tastyfresh foods.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_020仕事　探してるなら　任せたい～！
「」倒して　若葉を6枚　採ってきて～！
若葉は一度に　2枚採れる　それで幸せ　あんたも幸せ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_021<tab>Pssshkoh... Four, five...yes, six full leaves. Thank you uplander. Gobbieflock pack gobbie masks with herbs, keeps nose free of bad smells of bogs and mires. Loudjox can make many bundles, and double jinglyshine!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_021シュコォ……シュコォ……
これこれ　とっても　いい香り！
ゴブ特製の香草ブレンド　これで生産　増産ね～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_022<tab>Would uplander like to smell, too? No? Well, then uplander will want questprize. Loudjox is a gobbie of her word─here is jinglyshine for your service!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ811_01941_LOUDJOX_000_022ゴブリン族のマスクには　香草いっぱい詰まってる～！
そうすりゃいつでも　いい香り　どんな場所でも　いい香り！
それじゃあ　報酬　渡そうね～！
